id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-family-relationship with parent shifts toward adult partnership
title: Relationship with parent shifts toward adult partnership
description: Relationship with parent shifts toward adult partnership
content:
Scenario: Relationship with parent shifts toward adult partnership
    Given Jasmine has demonstrated substantial capability
    And she contributes meaningfully to household functioning
    When parent Maya interacts with Jasmine through the care economy
    Then the family_elohim should reflect their evolving relationship
    And Maya should receive prompts that honor Jasmine's growing autonomy
    And support Maya in trusting Jasmine's judgment
    And recognize when Jasmine needs support versus when she's capable
    And facilitate the gradual transition from parent-child to adult-adult relationship
    And help Maya learn to be available for support without controlling
